Traits.Name: Digging Claws
Traits.Description: Attacks gain pierce if a character has no adjacent allies.

Actions.Name: Burrow
Actions.Description: Mark a character in range 8. At the start of the beast's next turn, if that character is still marked, it teleports to a space adjacent to that character, dealing [D]. If the character is flying, they take no damage. If the character is alone, they take 2[D] instead and are slowed.
